title: Olari
description: >>Naji is a namer. She sees things as they are, and as they will be. So when the Queen Yanti arah Thahab arrives on her doorstep injured, she takes her in. But what Yanti is requesting goes against the direct orders of the empire. As Yanti hovers on the brink of death Naji wonders if she is willing to risk everything to perform the forbidden Olari rites.
author: Mila N. Sankale
